column2: Job Description: As a Customer Service/Sales Associate at Dr. Morepen, you will play a key role in delivering exceptional customer service and driving sales in our retail environment. Your primary responsibilities will include: Providing outstanding customer service to all customers by greeting them warmly,      assisting with inquiries, and addressing any concerns or issues promptly and effectively. Demonstrating in-depth knowledge of our products and services to educate customers and      recommend suitable products based on their needs and preferences. Handling customer transactions accurately and efficiently, including processing payments, refunds, and exchanges using our POS system. Maintaining a clean, organized, and inviting store environment to enhance the shopping      experience for customers. Assisting with inventory management tasks, including restocking shelves, monitoring      product levels, and conducting regular stock checks. Actively engaging in sales activities to meet or exceed sales targets, including upselling and cross-selling products to increase revenue. Participating in promotional events, sales campaigns, and other initiatives to drive      customer engagement and increase foot traffic to the store. Collaborating with team members and management to achieve store goals and objectives,      fostering a positive and supportive work environment. Qualifications: Previous experience in customer service, sales, or retail is preferred but not required. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport with customers and work effectively in a team environment. Excellent problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to addressing customer      needs and resolving issues. Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment while maintaining attention to detail and accuracy. Flexibility to work a variety of shifts, including evenings, weekends, and holidays, based on business needs. Basic computer skills and familiarity with POS systems is an asset. If you are passionate about delivering exceptional customer service, driving sales, and contributing to the success of our retail store, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

column2: Store Sales Representative:  Counter sales representatives help walk-in customers find the parts and equipment they need while providing prompt, friendly and professional service. Counter sales representatives assist customers through the entire sales process, monitor inventory and restock products as needed. They play a critical role in building relationships and providing excellent customer service.   Responsibilities: Assist walk-in customers with questions about products, applications and pricing. Process sales, including entering orders, pulling products out of inventory, and scheduling delivery or helping buyers load orders. Help maintain the facility, including stocking levels, cleanliness and organization of the branch and yard. Education & Experience: Graduation required 0 - 6 years of experience Great communication skills

column2: Key Important Attributes of Sales Consultant: Prerequisites of high performing sales consultant Enthusiasm / Proactive and sharp Communication / Ability to build a connection with Customer / Sharp attitude / Sales Aptitude to handle any Customer query or objection. Passionate for Sales, possessing strong convincing skills & turning around the Customer experience to be happy and positive. Resilience, ability to listen & tackle any Customer situation patiently. Keen focus on customer conversions and bookings through strong communication, trust building and customer first??approach. Have the ability to multitask, set priorities and manage time effectively. Superior listening, verbal, and written communication skills. Familiar with CRM & cloud telephony systems and practices. Possess previous experience in customer facing roles, in consultative product or service selling, preferred candidates with previous experience in a sales/ pre sales role in an Interior Designing company OR experience of working in Retail / Cross industry / store sales + 5 years experience dealing with Indian consumers. Key Requirements and Roles of Sales Consultant: Consulting prospective customers looking for home interiors via call/ in person meetings into high potential clients by high level engagement, building brand trust by sharing UL Home Interiors USPs, understanding their requirements to the granular level details and driving conversions by ensuring Customer books for their Interior fitout with Urban Interiors. Identify customers' home interior needs and requirements by prospecting and asking the right questions, clarify information, research every issue, and provide solutions and/or alternatives. Probing customers by understanding minutest details, Customer profile, budget expectation, design taste, any specific requirements to a theme, primary motivating factors for decision making. Driving conversions of prospective Customers into high potential leads for Interior Designers, by following a consultative selling approach. Possess ability to convert 1st customer interactions into bookings by building high rapport over first call with prospective clients, building the brand trust by passing on the right message, brand USPs, product offerings. Manage a large number of customer calls and discussions in a timely manner. Follow up with potential customers in a timely manner if necessary. Seize opportunities to upsell services when they arise and contribute to revenue increase. Demonstrate an aptitude for sales, be able to ask and fixing up for the next meeting, handle customer concerns leading to customer satisfaction. Apply a superlative customer experience attitude to all interactions. Be able to establish a positive rapport. Communicate effectively and professionally in all forms of communication with internal and external customers. WHO YOU ARE If you are a people person and someone who likes talking to people, there wouldn't be a better role for you on the planet. If you get energized by selling a high quality product and ensuring superlative customer experience then this is the role for you!!! Previous Experience? - Worked previously in a sales role in a B to C organization / Customer interaction / facing role with 3+ years of experience. Industry Worked In - ?B-C Sales/ Interior Design /Retail / Real Estate.

column2: Responsible to achieve the individual sales target and execute the company s strategies to enhance the store s profit.    Greet and receive customers in a welcoming manner, engage with them to understand their requirements.   Direct customers by escorting them to counters, introducing various products, and influencing customers buying decisions.   Drive sales through the engagement of customers through suggestive selling by building their confidence.   Conduct remote selling activities (sales through video calls, etc.) as and when requested by superiors in order to maximise customer reach.   Perform priority selling in case of aged stock in order to minimize the same by keeping customer satisfaction intact.   Perform cross selling/cross promotion to HNI Customers by introducing them to all product categories of Malabar Gold & Diamonds.   Understand & handle queries and complaints of the customer and address them with the right solution.   Provide excellent customer service, educate customers on benefits - Malabar Promises and product details (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc.) to ensure customer delight in each sale.   Pack products in front of the CCTV camera for orders received through online channels in order to maintain security protocol.   Receive customer returns after purchase and Old Gold by cross checking the terms and conditions and performing the necessary quality checks.   Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share it with the Manager for business improvement.   Ensure the accurate entry of customer details (e.g., name, address, date of birth, etc.,) after purchase to keep an accurate database of the customers.   Check for accuracy of the product details, weight, invoice after the sale in order to provide the customer with the right product and its details.       Schemes       Inform the customers on special offers and take steps to enroll maximum customers in various schemes.   Support customers in the scheme opening process and help with customer purchase against scheme balance   Create Advance customer profiles in the system and facilitate the enhancement of advances by the customers.   Customer Order Management    Coordinate the order placement of customer orders to respective SCM/MBMG via OMS software in order to ensure on time delivery.       Stock     Count & tally the stock on a daily basis and record the opening stock and closing stock in the section allotted.   Transfer the stock to the locker daily and ensure that ornaments are handled with care.   Report the sold stock to the section head for maintaining inventory; ensure timely stock replenishment.   Work area & Display   Execute all visual merchandising guidelines with respect to display and presentation of products within the store and maintain the quality and freshness of the same    Ensure safety of jewellery displayed to customers and communicate any abnormal incident promptly to the superiors.     Marketing     Generate customer leads and increase customer footfall.   Call & invite customers and leads to visit the Store especially during product exhibitions, promotional events/campaigns, etc.   Support the in-store team in event management and product exhibitions in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.   Build awareness of the products and services provided by the competitors, update product knowledge, and inform superiors about the latest trends in the market.   Assist in BTL marketing.       Internal process     Adhere to the company grooming standards and exhibit professionalism in appearance, behaviour, and in interactions with customers and team members.   Ensure adherence to the standard operating procedures and cost-effective practices undertaken in the store.   Prepare reports of sales data and submit them to Senior Management as and when required.       People development     Acquire knowledge in all sections of the store such as billing, cash, OMS, packing, etc.   Continuously strive for self-development by actively seeking opportunities for growth.    Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of the performance appraisal for self.   Take overall responsibility for identification of training needs and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications for self.
column11: Order management, Tally, Event management, Visual Merchandising, Billing, Packaging, Customer service, SCM, CCTV, Retail sales

Customer Order Management    Coordinate the order placement of customer orders to respective SCM/MBMG via OMS software in order to ensure on time delivery.       Stock     Count & tally the stock on a daily basis and record the opening stock and closing stock in the section allotted.   Transfer the stock to the locker daily and ensure that ornaments are handled with care.   Report the sold stock to the section head for maintaining inventory; ensure timely stock replenishment.   Work area & Display   Execute all visual merchandising guidelines with respect to display and presentation of products within the store and maintain the quality and freshness of the same    Ensure safety of jewellery displayed to customers and communicate any abnormal incident promptly to the superiors.   Marketing    Generate customer leads and increase customer footfall.   Call & invite customers and leads to visit the Store especially during product exhibitions, promotional events/campaigns, etc.   Support the in-store team in event management and product exhibitions in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.   Build awareness of the products and services provided by the competitors, update product knowledge, and inform superiors about the latest trends in the market.   Assist in BTL marketing.       Internal process     Adhere to the company grooming standards and exhibit professionalism in appearance, behaviour, and in interactions with customers and team members.   Ensure adherence to the standard operating procedures and cost-effective practices undertaken in the store.   Prepare reports of sales data and submit them to Senior Management as and when required.       People development     Acquire knowledge in all sections of the store such as billing, cash, OMS, packing, etc.   Continuously strive for self-development by actively seeking opportunities for growth.    Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of the performance appraisal for self.   Take overall responsibility for identification of training needs and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications for self.
column11: Order management, Tally, Event management, Visual Merchandising, Billing, Packaging, Customer service, SCM, CCTV, Retail sales

column2: Sales and Customer:    Responsible to achieve the individual sales target and execute the company s strategies to enhance the store s profit.    Greet and receive customers in a welcoming manner, engage with them to understand their requirements.   Direct customers by escorting them to counters, introducing various products, and influencing customers buying decisions.   Drive sales through the engagement of customers through suggestive selling by building their confidence.   Conduct remote selling activities (sales through video calls, etc.) as and when requested by superiors in order to maximise customer reach.   Perform priority selling in case of aged stock in order to minimize the same by keeping customer satisfaction intact.       Perform cross selling/cross promotion to HNI Customers by introducing them to all product categories of Malabar Gold Diamonds.   Understand handle queries and complaints of the customer and address them with the right solution.   Provide excellent customer service, educate customers on benefits - Malabar Promises and product details (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc.) to ensure customer delight in each sale.   Pack products in front of the CCTV camera for orders received through online channels in order to maintain security protocol.   Receive customer returns after purchase and Old Gold by cross checking the terms and conditions and performing the necessary quality checks.   Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share it with the Manager for business improvement.   Ensure the accurate entry of customer details (e.g., name, address, date of birth, etc.,) after purchase to keep an accurate database of the customers.   Check for accuracy of the product details, weight, invoice after the sale in order to provide the customer with the right product and its details. column2: Sales and Customer -:       - Responsible to achieve the individual sales target and execute the company s strategies to enhance the store s profit.    - Greet and receive customers in a welcoming manner, engage with them to understand their requirements.   - Direct customers by escorting them to counters, introducing various products, and influencing customers buying decisions.   - Drive sales through the engagement of customers through suggestive selling by building their confidence.   - Conduct remote selling activities (sales through video calls, etc.) as and when requested by superiors in order to maximise customer reach.   - Perform priority selling in case of aged stock in order to minimize the same by keeping customer satisfaction intact.   - Perform cross selling/cross promotion to HNI Customers by introducing them to all product categories of Malabar Gold & Diamonds.   - Understand & handle queries and complaints of the customer and address them with the right solution.   - Provide excellent customer service, educate customers on benefits - Malabar Promises and product details (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc.) to ensure customer delight in each sale.   - Pack products in front of the CCTV camera for orders received through online channels in order to maintain security protocol.   - Receive customer returns after purchase and Old Gold by cross checking the terms and conditions and performing the necessary quality checks.   - Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share it with the Manager for business improvement.   - Ensure the accurate entry of customer details (e.g., name, address, date of birth, etc.,) after purchase to keep an accurate database of the customers.   - Check for accuracy of the product details, weight, invoice after the sale in order to provide the customer with the right product and its details.       Schemes-:       - Inform the customers on special offers and take steps to enroll maximum customers in various schemes.   - Support customers in the scheme opening process and help with customer purchase against scheme balance   - Create Advance customer profiles in the system and facilitate the enhancement of advances by the customers.   Customer Order Management    - Coordinate the order placement of customer orders to respective SCM/MBMG via OMS software in order to ensure on time delivery.       Stock-:       - Count & tally the stock on a daily basis and record the opening stock and closing stock in the section allotted.   - Transfer the stock to the locker daily and ensure that ornaments are handled with care.   - Report the sold stock to the section head for maintaining inventory; ensure timely stock replenishment.       Work area & Display-:       - Execute all visual merchandising guidelines with respect to display and presentation of products within the store and maintain the quality and freshness of the same    - Ensure safety of jewellery displayed to customers and communicate any abnormal incident promptly to the superiors.       Marketing -:       - Generate customer leads and increase customer footfall.   - Call & invite customers and leads to visit the Store especially during product exhibitions, promotional events/campaigns, etc.   - Support the in-store team in event management and product exhibitions in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.   - Build awareness of the products and services provided by the competitors, update product knowledge, and inform superiors about the latest trends in the market.   - Assist in BTL marketing.       Internal process-:       - Adhere to the company grooming standards and exhibit professionalism in appearance, behaviour, and in interactions with customers and team members.   - Ensure adherence to the standard operating procedures and cost-effective practices undertaken in the store.   - Prepare reports of sales data and submit them to Senior Management as and when required.       People development-:       - Acquire knowledge in all sections of the store such as billing, cash, OMS, packing, etc.   - Continuously strive for self-development by actively seeking opportunities for growth.    - Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of the performance appraisal for self.   - Take overall responsibility for identification of training needs and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications for self.

Call & invite customers and leads to visit the Store especially during product exhibitions, promotional events/campaigns, etc.    Support the in-store team in event management and product exhibitions in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.    Build awareness of the products and services provided by the competitors, update product knowledge, and inform superiors about the latest trends in the market.    Assist in BTL marketing.      Internal process-:      Adhere to the company grooming standards and exhibit professionalism in appearance, behaviour, and in interactions with customers and team members.    Ensure adherence to the standard operating procedures and cost-effective practices undertaken in the store.    Prepare reports of sales data and submit them to Senior Management as and when required.      People development-:      Acquire knowledge in all sections of the store such as billing, cash, OMS, packing, etc.    Continuously strive for self-development by actively seeking opportunities for growth.    Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of the performance appraisal for self.    Take overall responsibility for identification of training needs and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications for self.
column11: Order management, Tally, Event management, Visual Merchandising, Billing, Packaging, Customer service, SCM, CCTV, Retail sales

column2: Sales and Customer -:      Responsible to achieve the individual sales target and execute the company s strategies to enhance the store s profit.    Greet and receive customers in a welcoming manner, engage with them to understand their requirements.    Direct customers by escorting them to counters, introducing various products, and influencing customers buying decisions.    Drive sales through the engagement of customers through suggestive selling by building their confidence.    Conduct remote selling activities (sales through video calls, etc.) as and when requested by superiors in order to maximise customer reach.    Perform priority selling in case of aged stock in order to minimize the same by keeping customer satisfaction intact.    Perform cross selling/cross promotion to HNI Customers by introducing them to all product categories of Malabar Gold Diamonds.    Understand handle queries and complaints of the customer and address them with the right solution.    Provide excellent customer service, educate customers on benefits - Malabar Promises and product details (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc.) to ensure customer delight in each sale.    Pack products in front of the CCTV camera for orders received through online channels in order to maintain security protocol.    Receive customer returns after purchase and Old Gold by cross checking the terms and conditions and performing the necessary quality checks.    Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share it with the Manager for business improvement.    Ensure the accurate entry of customer details (e.g., name, address, date of birth, etc.,) after purchase to keep an accurate database of the customers.    Check for accuracy of the product details, weight, invoice after the sale in order to provide the customer with the right product and its details.      Schemes-:      Inform the customers on special offers and take steps to enroll maximum customers in various schemes.    Support customers in the scheme opening process and help with customer purchase against scheme balance    Create Advance customer profiles in the system and facilitate the enhancement of advances by the customers.    Customer Order Management    Coordinate the order placement of customer orders to respective SCM/MBMG via OMS software in order to ensure on time delivery.      Stock-:      Count tally the stock on a daily basis and record the opening stock and closing stock in the section allotted.    Transfer the stock to the locker daily and ensure that ornaments are handled with care.    Report the sold stock to the section head for maintaining inventory; ensure timely stock replenishment.      Work area Display-:      Execute all visual merchandising guidelines with respect to display and presentation of products within the store and maintain the quality and freshness of the same    Ensure safety of jewellery displayed to customers and communicate any abnormal incident promptly to the superiors.      Marketing -:      Generate customer leads and increase customer footfall.    Call invite customers and leads to visit the Store especially during product exhibitions, promotional events/campaigns, etc.    Support the in-store team in event management and product exhibitions in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.    Build awareness of the products and services provided by the competitors, update product knowledge, and inform superiors about the latest trends in the market.    Assist in BTL marketing.      Internal process-:      Adhere to the company grooming standards and exhibit professionalism in appearance, behaviour, and in interactions with customers and team members.    Ensure adherence to the standard operating procedures and cost-effective practices undertaken in the store.    Prepare reports of sales data and submit them to Senior Management as and when required.      People development-:      Acquire knowledge in all sections of the store such as billing, cash, OMS, packing, etc.    Continuously strive for self-development by actively seeking opportunities for growth.    Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of the performance appraisal for self.    Take overall responsibility for identification of training needs and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications for self.

column2: Strategic Priorities:   Customer Satisfaction Process Execution as per SOPs Achieve Revenue Targets for Department/Category for the Store. Drive Profitability through Products and Services in co-ordination with Store Manager. Collaborate with Internal and External Stakeholders to drive events and workshops to build brand and its identity General Areas of Responsibility: Ensuring consistent delivery of high quality customer service as per the company standards in all areas of operations. Ensuring Customer Satisfaction and executing action plans to improve the customer satisfaction. Evaluating execution of Services (Grooming, Vet, Behaviour) to ensure service timelines are met and in case of any delays, ensuring that the issues are identified and acted upon to achieve 100% TAT. Driving 100% execution of operational standards as per the SOP's to deliver flawless Operations through proper communication and follow up, Identifying the bottle necks and seeking support to resolve the concerns.  Addressing and resolving all points of concern in a timely manner to avoid any risk/safety issues during operations. Monitoring stock and co-ordinating with responsible teams and departments to ensure availability of stocks at all times. Engaging with Pets & Pet Parents and suggesting required Products and Services by building knowledge of Products and Services to build loyalty, drive sales of differentiated products and private label products, enhancing knowledge of Pet Parents to build Pet Ownership Experience.   Cashiering & Controls: Handle cash, credit or other transactions with customers on POS or Kiosk Scan goods and collect payments Ensure pricing is correct Issue change, receipts, refunds; Redeem vouchers and coupons Make sales referrals, cross-sell products and introduce new ones Handling of petty Cash and recording in system Reconciliation of Cash and Credit Card transactions Process returns and check to see if items are damaged

column2: Greetings from Khazana Jewellery!!! We have a Good Opportunity in Showroom as Retail Sales Executive preferred with good communication skills/ presentable & having fair knowledge on sales and customer service. Designation: Retail Sales Executive Eligibility: Fresher / Experienced Qualification: PUC/ HSC ( Intermediate pass) / Diploma / Any Degree Gender: Male/ Female Languages Known: Telugu & English (Salary is not a constraint for the right candidate) Age: 19 to 30. Job Description for Retail Sales Executive: 1. Presents the customer with the needed Jewellery and provides information, such as pricing 2. Expertise in handling customers 3. Sale of the products, up-selling & cross-selling of products/services 4. Responsible for Counter Sales & Store operation 5. Responsible for selling the Gold, Diamond, Platinum, and silver items in Store. 6 .Receive stock additions, QC and manage inventory of the counter 7. Meeting Target as per store business Plan Benefits: Attractive monthly Incentives PF, ESI & Gratuity. Salary on Time. Yearly Salary Increment. Refreshments Provided. Interested can reach us on below number from 10AM to 6 PM. Whats app for more details - 7418171888 Vijayawada (Admin In charge - Mr Ramarao- 7032831218) Guntur (Admin In charge - Mr Dorababu - 9398188224) Khammam (Admin In charge - Mr Suresh - 9491828086 ) Mail Id: careers@khazanajewellery.com Regards, HR Team

customers in a retail setting to ensure a positive shopping experience      They interact with customers, provide product information, handle sales transactions, and maintain the store's appearance      The primary goal is to deliver exceptional customer service and meet sales targets        Responsibilities:        Customer Assistance: Greet and engage customers in a friendly and professional manner      Assess customer needs and preferences, offering assistance and product recommendations accordingly      Product Knowledge: Develop a comprehensive understanding of the products offered in techniques to upsell or cross-sell additional items      Strive to meet or exceed sales targets set by the store or management      Sales Transactions: Process sales transactions accurately and efficiently using the store's POS (Point of Sale) system      Handle cash, credit/debit cards, or other payment methods according to established procedures      Inventory Management: Assist in managing store inventory by restocking shelves, checking product expiration dates, and notifying supervisors when items need to be replenished      Store Maintenance: Ensure the store's cleanliness and organization by tidying up displays, shelves, and fitting rooms regularly      Monitor and report any maintenance or safety issues to the appropriate personnel      Customer Service Excellence: Merchandising: Help set up and arrange merchandise displays to attract customers and increase sales      Collaborate with the visual merchandising team to ensure the store's visual appeal is Requirements:High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or training in sales or retail is a plus      Proven experience in a retail sales or customer service role is desirable Greet and receive customers in a welcoming manner, engage with them to understand their requirements.   Direct customers by escorting them to counters, introducing various products, and influencing customers buying decisions.   Drive sales through the engagement of customers through suggestive selling by building their confidence.   Conduct remote selling activities (sales through video calls, etc.) as and when requested by superiors in order to maximise customer reach.   Perform priority selling in case of aged stock in order to minimize the same by keeping customer satisfaction intact.   Perform cross selling/cross promotion to HNI Customers by introducing them to all product categories of Malabar Gold & Diamonds.   Understand & handle queries and complaints of the customer and address them with the right solution.   Provide excellent customer service, educate customers on benefits - Malabar Promises and product details (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc.) to ensure customer delight in each sale.   Pack products in front of the CCTV camera for orders received through online channels in order to maintain security protocol.   Receive customer returns after purchase and Old Gold by cross checking the terms and conditions and performing the necessary quality checks.   Gather feedback from customers or prospects and share it with the Manager for business improvement.   Ensure the accurate entry of customer details (e.g., name, address, date of birth, etc.,) after purchase to keep an accurate database of the customers. Schemes     Inform the customers on special offers and take steps to enroll maximum customers in various schemes.   Support customers in the scheme opening process and help with customer purchase against scheme balance   Create Advance customer profiles in the system and facilitate the enhancement of advances by the customers.   Customer Order Management    Coordinate the order placement of customer orders to respective SCM/MBMG via OMS software in order to ensure on time delivery.       Stock     Count & tally the stock on a daily basis and record the opening stock and closing stock in the section allotted.   Transfer the stock to the locker daily and ensure that ornaments are handled with care.   Report the sold stock to the section head for maintaining inventory; ensure timely stock replenishment.     Work area & Display     Execute all visual merchandising guidelines with respect to display and presentation of products within the store and maintain the quality and freshness of the same    Ensure safety of jewellery displayed to customers and communicate any abnormal incident promptly to the superiors.     Marketing      Generate customer leads and increase customer footfall.   Call & invite customers and leads to visit the Store especially during product exhibitions, promotional events/campaigns, etc.   Support the in-store team in event management and product exhibitions in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.   Build awareness of the products and services provided by the competitors, update product knowledge, and inform superiors about the latest trends in the market.   Assist in BTL marketing. Ensure adherence to the standard operating procedures and cost-effective practices undertaken in the store.   Prepare reports of sales data and submit them to Senior Management as and when required.       People development     Acquire knowledge in all sections of the store such as billing, cash, OMS, packing, etc.   Continuously strive for self-development by actively seeking opportunities for growth.    Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of the performance appraisal for self. column2: A. Selling                 Acknowledge and approach customers, establish customer needs     Present, demonstrate and sell the benefits of the merchandise     Complete the sale and make related sales     Make a continuous effort to have the best sales results for the department     Introduce customers to other departments after having dealt with their needs     Assist in any other section of the shop, which may be under pressure             B. Presentation and Merchandise         Ensure the complete, full range of stocks are on display always     Ensure the merchandise is displayed in an attractive and enticing manner to customers     Handle and demonstrate the merchandise with confidence and in a professional manner     Keep the merchandise and surrounding area clean and tidy     Store the merchandise in a proper manner to avoid breakage or damage             C. Stock Administration         Assist in stock control, check, and count goods     Maintain the highest level of accuracy when checking and counting goods     Maintain the highest level of inventory control daily     Take part in Duty Free stock-takes             D. Stock Security         Ensure the highest level of confidentiality with regards to all company documentation, information, and statistics     Ensure that only authorized personnel have access to keys, security codes and passwords     Ensure the proper protection of high-risk stock.     Ensure that senior management are notified of any breach of security     Ensure proper use of any special security devices available     Ensure that a high degree of security on stocks and cash prevails always             E. Customer Service         Ensure the highest standard of customer service and customer care is offered to all customers of DDFS     Ensure that any customer complaints or problems are dealt with properly as they arise     Process customer s transactions efficiently, ensuring minimum time spent processing and packing     Be effective in highlighting and making customers aware of any/ all shop promotions     Ensure POS area is fully stocked with items for Gift with Purchase , the various sized plastic carrier bags, till rolls etc.                 F. Health and Safety         Be alert to hazards in any part of the shop and stores, report the same to the shop supervisors, floor manager or other senior management immediately     Use all equipment in the manner it was designed     Be aware of emergency procedures and be prepared to carry out established procedures in the event of an emergency     Ensure the safety of customers and colleagues always             G. Cash Register Procedures         Ensure the float is correct and that all keyed information into the POS terminal is done so accurately     Process customer s transactions efficiently     Handling money/cheques/credit cards and any form of payment in a safe, secure, and responsible manner     Ensure cash and documentation is secure always     Balance the cash at the end of the shift             H. Equipment Failure         Inform the Cash Till Leader or Assistant Operations Manager for immediate corrective action             I. Personal appearance and manner         Set example of company image by a high standard of personal appearance and attitude     Ensure you are dressed in full company uniform always to present a professional image of the company     Behave in a polite and business-like manner while on duty and show the highest regard for all our customers always     Be pleasant and approachable             Summary of Duties and Responsibilities         The Sales Associate is responsible for selling merchandise to customers     He/she must ensure that the retail policies and procedures are properly implemented in DDFS     He/she takes part in all company training as assigned     Must partake in any other duties as assigned by the management of DDFS       Skills       Sales     billing     CUSTOMER SERVICE     cashiering

column2: Comforto Bedding is a leading mattress and bedding accessories provider through eCommerce channels and offline Showroom in Rohini, Delhi. Comforto is a featured brand on Amazon and Pepperfry and we are building an exciting and hassle-free mattress-buying experience through our website as well. The mattress industry was largely unorganized in previous decades but with the advent of eCommerce and the dynamic buying preferences of consumers, the online industry for mattresses is one of the fastest-growing in the Furniture segment. We are working through the transition and challenges of this industry and are building a unique buying experience with a focus on customer satisfaction. Sales Executive's Roles and Responsibility:   ?? Responsible for qualifying consumers, developing interest, and closing sales of Comforto products through follow-up, outbound calls, chats, and emails, and customers visiting the showroom.  ?? Welcome customers to the store and answer their queries  ??Service consumers seeking assistance via various engagement channels such as phone, email, chat,  in-person, etc.  ??Understanding of all major and minor product categories  ??Results oriented to drive departmental revenue goals through the suggestive selling of mattresses and accessories to consumers  ??Exceed established key performance indicators metrics such as quality, consumer satisfaction, attendance, adherence to schedule, service call avoidance, average handle times, and resolution  ??Leverage the voice of the consumer to identify and make recommendations, utilizing a continuous improvement and innovative mindset  ??Assisting consumers in navigating Comforto Beddings website and placing orders online  ??Providing knowledgeable answers to questions related to products, pricing, warranties, and availability   ??Listen and understand consumers needs and provide real, effective solutions while delivering exceptional customer service  ??Document standard operating procedures for all areas of the consumer journey, including escalation paths, inventory inquiries, site navigation, returns, and exchanges

column2: An inspired self-starter able to drive sales growth. Ultimately, a top-notch sales executive should be able to build rapport with customers and close sales.      Duties and Responsibilities      Key Responsibilities      - Fulfill and achieve distribution and sales objectives for key brands in the on-trade channel.    - Ensure compliance of sales, price management, promotion, and merchandising.    - Focus on driving sales in Hardware, Paints, Cement Sanitary channels.    - Implement promotional activities at the highest possible standard.    - Manage and improve performance of assigned trade accounts.      Distribution      - Achieve distribution objectives for specific SKUs as per sales plan.    - Maintain a high standard of presence and merchandising for key products.    - Implement target price levels for both trade and consumers.      Promotions      - Identify target outlets and negotiate promotional activities.    - Provide feedback and evaluation of results for sales and marketing management review.      Control      - Recommend appropriate credit levels and duration to trade accounts.    - Proactively manage receivables to achieve collection targets.      Trade Relationships      - Develop and maintain amiable win-win relationships with Distributors, Sub Distributors, PoS.      Sales Management      - Achieve monthly sales target volume.    - Increase point of sales (PoS).    - Provide timely and accurate information for updating Salesforce.com.      Requirements      - Graduate/MBA (Sales Marketing) with 4+ years of sales experience in FMCG companies, Building materials such as CC, Paint, Cement, etc.    - Experience in Construction Chemicals preferred.    - Excellent interpersonal skills and outgoing personality.    - Possess analytical and logical thinking.    - Disciplined approach to management.    - Computer skills - MS Office, CRM.    - Ability to work under pressure and deliver targets within tight deadlines.    - Strong team player.    - Strong communication and interpersonal skills.    - Results-driven and self-motivated.    - Ability to adapt to changing market conditions and customer needs.      Qualifications / Experience:      - Education: Graduate/MBA (Sales Marketing) with minimum 4+ years of experience in relevant industry.    - Knowledge of Sales Marketing mainly in Paints or adhesives or similar industries retail channel is a must.      Competencies/Functional      - Self-starter with strong hands-on approach.    - Pragmatic problem-solving skills.    - Marketing sense: adequate marketing demand analysis, business model, marketing activities.    - Technical skills: product knowledge, solving application problems, articulating product advantages.      Behavioral      - Innovative with a high level of self-motivation.    - Team player.

column2: Job Description: Lux Industries Limited is a leading player in the textile industry, known for its high-quality products and customer-centric approach. We are currently seeking a dynamic and motivated Sales Executive to join our team at our retail outlet located in Chennai Airport. Role & responsibilities   Greet and assist customers as they enter the retail outlet, providing exceptional customer service at all times. Understand customers' needs and recommend appropriate products to meet their requirements. Demonstrate in-depth knowledge of Lux Industries Limited products, including features, benefits, and pricing. Actively participate in sales activities to achieve individual and team targets.Collaborate with team members to ensure smooth operations and a positive working environment. Maintain cleanliness and organization of the retail outlet to provide an inviting shopping environment. Assist in inventory management by conducting regular stock checks and replenishing products as needed. Process transactions accurately and efficiently using the POS (Point of Sale) system. Handle customer inquiries, concerns, and complaints in a professional and timely manner, escalating issues to the appropriate personnel when necessary. Collaborate with team members to ensure smooth operations and a positive working environment. Adhere to company policies and procedures, including those related to sales, safety, and security. Flexibility to work in rotational shifts, including evenings, weekends, and holidays, as per the operational requirements of the airport. Preferred candidate profile   Minimum of 1-2 years of experience in sales, preferably in a retail or customer service environment. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage customers effectively. Strong sales acumen and negotiation skills, with a passion for driving results. Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering exceptional service. Ability to work well under pressure and handle multiple tasks simultaneously. Basic computer proficiency, including knowledge of POS systems and MS Office applications. Proactive attitude with a willingness to learn and adapt to changing situations. Prior experience working in an airport retail environment will be an added advantage. Minimum educational qualification: High school diploma or equivale   Note:  The salary mentioned is the hand salary, excluding any deductions or benefits.

column2: Overview: As a Sales Person, you play a vital role in delivering exceptional customer service and driving sales within the mall's retail environment. Your primary responsibility is to assist customers in finding and purchasing products, contributing to a positive shopping experience that encourages repeat business. Responsibilities: 1. Customer Assistance: Greet customers warmly, assess their needs, and provide product information and recommendations to help them make informed purchasing decisions. 2. Sales Generation: Actively engage with customers to promote products, upsell additional items. 3. Product Knowledge: Maintain a thorough understanding of the products available in the store, including features, benefits, and pricing, to effectively assist customers and answer their inquiries. 4. Visual Merchandising: Assist in maintaining attractive product displays, including restocking shelves, arranging merchandise, and ensuring that the store's visual standards are met. 5. Customer Service: Handle customer inquiries, concerns, and returns in a professional and courteous manner, striving to resolve issues to the customer's satisfaction. 6. Store Maintenance: Assist in maintaining the cleanliness and organization of the store, including tidying shelves, vacuuming floors, and ensuring that the store's appearance is inviting to customers. Requirements: 1. Customer Focus: Strong customer service orientation with a friendly and approachable demeanor. 2. Sales Skills: Demonstrated ability to engage customers, identify their needs, and close sales. 3. Communication: Effective verbal communication skills to interact with customers and team members. 4. Team Player: Willingness to collaborate with colleagues to achieve sales targets and maintain store operations. 5. Reliability: Dependable and punctual, with a commitment to fulfilling scheduled shifts. 6. Flexibility: Ability to adapt to changing priorities and work in a fast-paced retail environment. 7. Physical Stamina: Capable of standing for extended periods and lifting/moving merchandise as needed. Note: This job description outlines the primary duties and requirements for the Mall Sales Person position but may be subject to change based on the specific needs of the store and company policies.

column2: Customer Service : Providing excellent customer service by greeting customers, assisting them in finding products, and addressing their inquiries and concerns in a professional and courteous manner. Sales Generation : Actively engaging customers to promote products and achieve sales targets. Demonstrating product features, benefits, and usage to encourage purchases. Upselling and cross-selling products to increase sales revenue. Product Knowledge : Maintaining a thorough understanding of the products sold in the store, including their features, specifications, and pricing. Staying updated on new arrivals, promotions, and special offers. Stock Management : Ensuring adequate stock levels on the sales floor by monitoring inventory levels, restocking shelves, and replenishing merchandise as needed. Conducting regular stock checks and reporting any discrepancies to management. Visual Merchandising : Assisting with visual merchandising activities, such as arranging product displays, signage, and promotional materials to attract customers and enhance the overall shopping experience. Cash Handling and Transactions : Processing customer transactions accurately and efficiently using point-of-sale (POS) systems. Handling cash, credit/debit card payments, and issuing receipts to customers. Store Maintenance : Keeping the store clean, organized, and well-maintained at all times. Performing routine cleaning tasks, such as dusting shelves, vacuuming floors, and tidying up the sales area. Customer Engagement : Building rapport with customers to foster long-term relationships and repeat business. Proactively engaging with customers to understand their needs and preferences, and recommending suitable products accordingly. Promotions and Events : Assisting with promotional events, product launches, and sales campaigns to drive foot traffic and increase sales. Distributing promotional materials and encouraging customer participation in events. Team Collaboration : Collaborating with colleagues and other departments to achieve store objectives and deliver exceptional customer service. Communicating effectively with team members and sharing information to ensure a cohesive and productive work environment. Compliance and Security : Adhering to store policies, procedures, and safety guidelines to maintain a secure and compliant working environment. Following protocols for handling returns, exchanges, and refunds in accordance with company policies. Training and Development : Participating in training sessions and workshops to enhance product knowledge, sales skills, and customer service abilities. Keeping abreast of industry trends and best practices in retail sales Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Company Overview: Oben Electric , a trailblazing electric motorcycle manufacturer, was established in August 2020 by visionary alumni from prestigious institutions like IIT and IIM. Headquartered in Bengaluru, we are driven by relentless innovation and a commitment to excellence towards  'Design in India for the World'. With a robust R&D infrastructure, we design, develop, and manufacture electric motorcycles and critical EV components in-house, holding over 25+ patents for our proprietary technology. Oben Electric is driving the widespread adoption of electric motorcycles across India and beyond. Join us in shaping the future of mobility and be a part of our journey towards sustainable transportation solutions. Website:  www.obenelectric.com Position :  Assistant Manager  Retail Sales (0-3 year of experience) Locations:  Bangalore,  Why you should consider this position: Competitive fixed salary package. Lucrative incentive structure, you can earn up to  2X  of your monthly salary as sales incentive. Fast track of career growth path in sales and management. Hands-on learning of financial planning and forecasting. Dynamic and collaborative work environment. Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance. Comprehensive health insurance and wellness programs. Key Responsibilities: Responsible for managing the entire experience centre operation. Drive sales from the experience centre based on monthly targets. Generate new leads from the various sources. Engage with potential customers and provide them with suitable solutions. Follow-up with existing leads via various mediums to drive conversions and achieve targets. Manage end to end sales cycle for potential customer. Assisting potential customers with company designated financing options and delivery process. Planning and forecasting of monthly, quarterly and annual sales revenues and expenses from different channels such as Vehicles, accessories and merchandise. Prepare and manage quotations, invoices, documentations and payments. Building healthy customer relationships and maintaining good reputation of the assigned experience centre. Maintain a thorough knowledge of the product, including specifications, pricing. Stay up to date with industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities. Requirements: 0-3 Years of proven sales experience, preferably in a related industry. Proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong follow up and persuasion abilities. Customer-oriented mindset with a focus on providing exceptional service. Valid two-wheeler driver's license. Self-motivated with a results-oriented mindset.

column2: Urgent Requirement || Cars24 is hiring for Retail Associates at Kochi   ( Fixed Salary + Incentives* & applicable Statutory Benefits^) Job Description - Retail Associate About the Role:  A challenging role with tremendous potential for personal and professional growth with full support from the management and a growing portfolio. Job Responsibilities: Ensuring that all customers receive excellent service through direct salesmanship, and prompt and courteous service. Assisting customers with questions & needs. Cultivating successful relationships with retail customers. Completing each transaction in a quick and efficient manner. Handling all store operations Identifying customer requirements and assisting customers with purchase decisions. Assisting in physical inventory counts. Making sure that customers paperwork is completed efficiently. We are looking for: People who come with 1 - 3 years of work experience. column1: Sales Executive/ Visual Merchandiser - Retails showroom -  Furnishing
column2: Sales Executive- Retail  (Furnishing Industry) **Job Summary:** As a Sales Executive in the furnishing industry, you will be responsible for driving sales and revenue growth by promoting and selling furnishing products to potential and existing customers. You will utilize your excellent communication and negotiation skills to build strong relationships with clients and provide them with the best furnishing solutions to meet their needs. **Responsibilities:** 1. **Sales Generation:**    - Identify new business opportunities and develop strategies to acquire new customers.    - Achieve sales targets and objectives within the assigned territory.    - Generate leads through various channels, including cold calling, networking, and referrals.    - Follow up on leads and conduct sales presentations to potential clients.    - Maintain a strong sales pipeline and report regularly on sales activities. 2. **Customer Relationship Management:**    - Build and maintain relationships with new and existing customers.    - Understand customer needs and offer suitable furnishing solutions.    - Provide excellent customer service and support to ensure client satisfaction.    - Address customer inquiries and resolve any issues or concerns in a timely manner. 3. **Product Knowledge:**    - Develop a deep understanding of the company's furnishing products and services.    - Stay up-to-date with industry trends, market activities, and competitors.    - Effectively communicate the features, advantages, and benefits of the products to customers.    - Provide product demonstrations and samples to clients as needed. 4. **Sales Strategy and Planning:**    - Develop and implement strategic sales plans to expand the customer base and achieve sales goals.    - Identify key market segments and tailor sales strategies accordingly.    - Analyze sales data and market trends to adjust strategies and tactics.    - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional campaigns and materials. 5. **Reporting:**    - Prepare and submit regular sales reports, forecasts, and budgets.    - Maintain accurate records of all sales and prospecting activities.    - Provide feedback to management on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services. **Qualifications:** - Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. - Proven experience as a Sales Executive or relevant role in the furnishing industry. - Strong sales, negotiation, and communication skills. - Excellent customer service and relationship-building abilities. - Ability to work independently and as part of a team. - Results-oriented with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. - Knowledge of CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite. - Willingness to travel within the assigned territory. If interested send your updated resume at ksharan@esolutionsindia.net with following details 1. Current CTC:* 2. Expected CTC:* 3. Current Location:* 4. Notice Period:* 5. Total Experience in Sales:* 6. Experience of Showroom Sales : * 7. How would you rate yourself in English on a scale of 10 (10 = Excellent):* 8. Are you comfortable to work at Lajpat Nager, Delhi:* 9. Current Designing : * 10. Education :* 11. Availability for F2F Interview on urgent : YES/NO:*  12. Age:  13. Do you have any experience as  Visual Merchandiser Interested Candidate can apply on ksharan@esolutionsindia.net with mandatory answer of question . Regards & Thanks Kaushal 9873776969  ksharan@esolutionsindia.net

column2: Role & responsibilities   Welcome the customers on arrival to the showroom  Responsible for Counter Sales & Store operation Responsible for selling the Gold, Diamond and Platinum, in Store.  Meeting Target as per store business Plan  Greets and meets customers on arrival at the shop Listens attentively to a customers needs and gives explicit explanation to satisfy such a customer Presents the customer with the needed jewellery and provides information, such as pricing; and gives a discount if needed. position involves collaborating with retailers, understanding their needs, and implementing strategies to enhance engagement and satisfaction          Key Responsibilities:          Retailer Relationship Management:Cultivate and maintain positive relationships with retail partners      Act as the primary point of contact for retailers, addressing inquiries, concerns, and providing timely support      Conduct regular check-ins to understand retailer needs and gather feedback      Business Development:Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to identify new business opportunities Analysis:Monitor and analyze retailer performance metrics      Provide insights and recommendations to internal teams based on performance data      Issue Resolution:Proactively identify and address column2: JD   for   Associate   Ecommerce   Sales   :   Village   Company About   Us Co-founded by ISB alumnus Coneenika Choudhuri, Village Company offers handcrafted natural luxuries sourced closest to the origin from every Indian village. All our products are unprocessed, provenance-tracked, consciously sourced and sustainably packaged. We are available on Amazon, Swiggy and of course, our website (www.villagecompanystore.com). Since our inception, we've been dedicated to delivering excellence to our customers with our 100% delight promise. Join   Our   Vibrant   Team! At Village Company, we're not just about work; we're about creating a dynamic and exciting environment where every day is an adventure. If you're passionate about e-commerce, love the fast-paced world of online sales, and thrive in a fun and ambitious workplace, then we want you to be part of our team! Position : Associate Ecommerce Sales Department : Sales Location : Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh Work   Schedule:  Full-time, in-oce 6 days a week (Monday to Saturday), 8 AM to 6 PM ( Note:   Flexibility   based   on   business   needs) Are you ready to unleash your skills in the world of e-commerce? As an Associate in Ecommerce Sales at Village Company, you'll be instrumental in optimizing our online business operations and delivering exceptional customer service. From managing our online sales channels to enhancing the overall customer experience, you'll play a pivotal role in driving our e-commerce success. Responsibilities:  Account management and operational tasks for e-commerce marketplaces such  as  Zepto,   Blinkit,   Instamart   and   Amazon , including onboarding, product listings, and product pricing.  Coordinate with marketplaces' Points of Contact (POCs) for sales growth, marketing, orders, and business strategies.  Conduct thorough market research to determine pricing strategies, target demographics, and positioning for new products.  Develop comprehensive launch plans for new products, including listing optimization, advertising strategies, and promotional activities.  Analyze marketplace trac, customer feedback, and other data to identify areas of improvement and develop strategies to maximize online sales.  Stay informed about industry developments and platform updates, to maintain a competitive edge. Preferred   Skills   and   Qualications:  Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related eld.  More than 2 years of experience in managing marketplace accounts on platforms  such as  Zepto,   Blinkit,   Instamart   and   Amazon , etc., in a D2C environment.  Proven track record of successfully launching and promoting products on  ecommerce platforms, driving measurable results.  Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions. Perks   &   Benets:  CTC of 3-6 lakhs per annum + Variable Performance Incentives + ESOPs  Untethered freedom and liberty to own your revenue targets.  Exciting opportunities for career growth, mentorship and advancement  Youd report directly to the co-founders.  Supportive and inclusive work environment   Fun team events, outings, and celebrations. Ready   to   Join   Us? If you're ready to bring your passion and skills to a young, fun, and ambitious workplace, then we want to hear from you! Apply now at https://forms.gle/NHyiG1ZursY3KUFM8  and let's embark on this exciting journey together.

column2: Functional Responsibilities-:       * Assist Sales Manager in the supervision of sales sections & guide sales team for daily store operations to ensure effectiveness and provide support in implementing strategies to attract customers.   * Responsible to achieve the sales target for the assigned section and recommend solutions to enhance store s profit.    * Coordinate daily customer service operations (e.g., sales processes, orders & payments) and assist in tracking the progress of weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual targets.   * Participate regularly in the Managers meeting and ensure the implementation & execution of decisions made.   * Check the quality of gold by manual testing and also with the help of gold check karat analyser.   * Calculate and share the estimates upon making the sale.   * Perform end to end activities of bill transaction for D2D (Dealer to Dealer) in cases of Advance, exhibition etc. where transactions take place between showrooms.   * Ensure the assigned team is communicating Malabar Promises, product details (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc.) and offers to ensure customer delight in each sale.       Sales and Customer-:       * Greet and receive customers in a welcoming manner, engage with them to understand their requirements and advise customers by providing information on products.   * Drive sales through the engagement of customers and influence their buying decision through suggestive selling by building their confidence.   * Provide excellent customer service & accurate product information (e.g., product name, features, making charge, stone charge etc.) to ensure customer delight in each sale.   * Execute all customer experience guidelines and protocols that are set by the Retail leadership in order to provide a differentiated level of service.   * Close deals, understand & handle queries and complaints of the customer and address with the right solution.   * Interact with customers to build relationships and leverage the same to generate leads for the store.   * Maintain effective communication throughout the store and communicate customer experiences and feedback to the sales manager.       Stock -:       * Maintain the quality and freshness of the existing stock in order to maintain stock presentability at the appropriate counter.   * Monitor the movement of stock of one s section from the safe to the floor, and vice versa as well as the stock tallying in the system in order to adhere to the security guidelines.   * Oversee inventory levels of the section that is assigned in order to advise the Sales Manager on products that need to be replenished; Co-ordinate aged/dead stock redistribution among stores in order to maximize inventory turnover.   * Handle the activities that involve ordering of products via OMS and receiving of the products in compliance with the planogram and safety protocols.    * Ensure safety of jewellery displayed by monitoring and guiding sales staffs and communicate any potential theft/damage/malpractices promptly to the superiors.   * Ensure adequate no: of equipment s, supplies in the sales counters (Weighing machines, calculators, estimates, other tools).       Merchandising-:       * Manage merchandising activities for the assigned section (e.g., providing suggestions on assortment mix, planogram, movement of aged/dead stock, etc.) and support in maintaining appropriate merchandising standards throughout the store.   * Assist in researching emerging products and use information to update the store s merchandise.       Marketing-:       * Regularly monitor the store ambience so that it is adheres to the Visual Merchandising guidelines   * Participate in all product launches and promotions in the Store.   * Support the in-store Marketing team in event management in order to engage the target audience and proper delivery of the messaging of the event.   * Assist in creating reports, analyse and interpret retail data, like revenues, expenses and competition.   * Meet wedding customers & other potential customers from the CRM database /showroom leads in order to generate leads.       Employee Management-:       * Motivate sales staff to deliver excellent customer service, improve their efficiency, and meet sales targets.   * Assist in evaluating employee performance, conduct periodic reviews and annual appraisal for providing proper feedback to staff.   * Optimally deploy staff in the respective section based on the available staff strength and ensure the presence of sufficient employees in the sales counter.   * Observe the behavior of sales executives with the customers and in case of any misbehavior, give instructions and advise to behave properly.   * Monitor whether the staff within one s sub section is following the grooming guidelines as set by the retail leadership in order to maintain uniformity.   * Act as a guide to the sales staff in the respective section by implementing on-site product and sales training activities, in line with guidelines from HR.       People development-:       * Continuously strive for self-development & team development by actively identifying opportunities for growth.    * Ensure adherence to timelines for completion of performance appraisal for self & team.    * Take overall responsibility for the training need analysis and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications for self & team.   * Impart on the job training to the sales staffs assigned to him for their skill development.
column11: People development, Manual testing, Event management, Employee management, Visual Merchandising, Customer service operations, Training need analysis, Performance appraisal, Retail sales, CRM

column2: About Us    The Senior Store associate is responsible for all activities at the store in the absence of the assistant manager or store manager. His/her job description entails ensuring maximum sales by the store as well as excellent customer service in helping customers locate, select, and purchase products.      He/she serves as the company brand representative, upholding the highest standards in carrying out daily functions. The senior Store associates role involves providing exceptional customer care and achieving sales goals to ensure the stores objectives on sales and profits are met. He/she is expected to take on higher responsibilities that may be assigned by the manager or assistant manager within the store.     With such employers, the purpose of the senior store associates role may include generating sales to surpass personal sales goals, as well as effectively promoting the companys programs. The associate should be well trained to be able to give effective sales presentations and build rewarding relationships with customers. The duties of the senior store associate also involve promoting customer loyalty and giving each customer the best service they have ever got. The senior store associate work description also involves ensuring the security of the store.   Responsibilities      Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent sales service     Maintain outstanding store condition and visual merchandising standards     Maintain a fully stocked store     Ascertain customers needs and wants     Recommend and display items that match customer needs     Welcome and greet customers     Manage point-of-sale processes     Actively involved in the receiving of new shipments and checking inventory     Keep up to date with product information     Accurately describe product features and benefits     Follow all companies policies and procedures     Minimum Qualifications, Skills and Competencies      Bachelors/Masters degree in the relevant field     Proven working experience in retail sales     Basic understanding of sales principles and customer service practices     Excellent Communication Skills     Customer service focused     Animal Lover Preferred
column11: Basic, Sales, Customer satisfaction, Visual Merchandising, Store Associate, Focus, Customer service, Inventory, Retail sales, Sales achievement

column2: - Assist Sales Manager in the supervision of sales sections & guide sales team for daily store operations to ensure effectiveness and provide support in implementing strategies to attract customers.    - Responsible to achieve the sales target for the assigned section and recommend solutions to enhance store s profit.    - Coordinate daily customer service operations (eg, sales processes, orders & payments) and assist in tracking the progress of weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual targets.    - Participate regularly in the Managers meeting and ensure the implementation & execution of decisions made.    - Check the quality of gold by manual testing and also with the help of gold check karat analyser.    - Calculate and share the estimates upon making the sale.    - Perform end to end activities of bill transaction for D2D (Dealer to Dealer) in cases of Advance, exhibition etc where transactions take place between showrooms.    - Ensure the assigned team is communicating Malabar Promises, product details (eg, product name, features, making charge, stone charge, etc) and offers to ensure customer delight in each sale.

column2: Store Performance-:       - Support the Store Head in planning the annual store target and annual sales budget for the store; Monitor adherence to the same by planning and executing all sales activities.   - Drive sales to achieve the Return on Capital Employed (ROCE) of the Store.   - Execute scheme and advance activities to adhere to guidelines designed by the retail leadership and assist in recommending initiatives for the promotion of the same.   - Store Champion for all Omni-Channel activities and leads online order management activities to enable omni-channel readiness and conducts activities assigned by the Store Head for the overall readiness of the store to fulfil the omni-channel orders.   - Ensure the standards of the store visual merchandising for the attractive showcase of products at the appropriate counter.   - Maintain the stability and reputation of the store by complying with legal requirements.       Sales & Customer-:       - Cater to customer requirements as per their need, by showcasing products to make the sale in order to achieve store and exhibition target.   - Supervise the sales team for daily store operations and ensure productivity and recommend solutions to enhance store s profit.    - Close deals, handle queries and complaints of the customer and address them with the right solution.   - Lead business development initiatives for the store and enhance footfall and sales generated from increased leads.       Stock Management-:       - Monitor the inventory for the store (including stock levels, daily stock tallying, quality, display, etc.); Manage timely placement and receipt of stock, customer and repair orders in order to reduce disruption to store business.    - Review order placement and order receipt (stock, customer, repair orders) to prevent any mistakes and spot any issues.    - Support the Store Leadership in managing the inventory for the exhibition in order to have sufficient stock to achieve the desired target.   - Facilitate weighing of stock on a periodic basis, report it to accounts department and management for recording purpose.   - Assist Showroom Heads / Dy: showroom Heads in deciding the products to be purchased / ordered, about shortage / excess of any designs, fast moving items etc.   - Clear dead stocks in consultation with Showroom Heads / Dy: showroom Heads and sales executives of each section.       Sales Support-:       - Spearhead new product introduction as per the store needs and continuously provide feedback to merchandising teams on product performance.   - Finalize the assortment mix in the store based on the criteria defined by the Head - Merchandising, to maintain the appropriate amount of stock in the store.    - Analyse, monitor and create reports regarding sales performance pre, post and during exhibition for data driven decision making.   - Follow the workflow as stated by the merchandising and SCM teams to identify aged/dead stock; and track its physical movement from own store to another and vice versa.    - Implement customer interaction and experience guidelines as set by the retail leadership in order to build relationships and leverage the same to generate leads for the store.   - Drive activities for the collection of customer data (pre purchase) in the store so that the business can accurately analyze the data in order to make more informed business decisions.   - Supervise the billing and issue of old gold bars to the SCM, as per the processes defined by the SCM team to minimize business disruption.    - Keep a check on old gold yield and monitor the profitability from the same.   - Assist in specific store opening and closing protocols (such as daily stock tally, stock entry and movement of stock) in order to maintain store safety and security.       Employee Management-:       - Motivate sales staff to deliver excellent customer service, improve their efficiency, and meet sales targets.   - Communicate job expectations to the team; plan, monitor, appraise and review job contributions in a regular manner.   - Confer with team members to discuss issues, coordinate activities or resolve problems to facilitate execution excellence.   - Take overall responsibility for the training need analysis and completion of mandatory training programs/certifications (product training/policy training) for self & team.   - Monitor team performance on a continuous basis to identify and develop high performers so as to motivate them, and coach low performers.   - Contribute towards development of talent for the department by providing direct reports with adequate exposure and growth opportunities.   - Evaluate the employee performance and counsel/replace sales staff who are unreliable, failing to perform, or otherwise not complying with company policies and procedures.       Marketing-:       - Keep abreast of new trends/ products available in the market, making charges & stone charges and report on customer needs to Superiors.   - Allot Sales team for BTL activities.
column11: Order management, Tally, Stock management, Visual Merchandising, Billing, Workflow, Customer service, SCM, Retail sales, Customer interaction
