column2: Deputy Manager - Retail Sales Balmer Lawrie is a Mini Ratna I Public Sector Undertaking under the Ministry of Petroleum & Natural Gas. The Company operates in various business segments through Strategic Business Units [SBUs] and Joint Venture Companies [JVCs]. You can visit the Company's website http://www.balmerlawrie.com/ for further details about the Company.  The company is looking for qualified and experienced professionals to man the role of  Deputy Manager - Retail Sales  for the Company. It is in the Grade of  E2  in the  Pay Scale  of  Rs. 50000 - 160000 .   The Position Profile is as follows: Maximum Age : 32 years as on  05.07.2024  Minimum Qualification:  Full Time Engineering Graduate (any specialisation) Or 2 years MBA or Post Graduate Degree / Diploma# in Management  Minimum Experience (Years) : 5 years as on  05.07.2024  Preferred Experience:  Candidates with experience is sales through dealer / distributor network in the field of Retail Sales of Lubricants / Consumables/ FMCG/ FMCD shall be preferred  Indicative Job Description:    The incumbent will be responsible for  1. To achieve the Retail (Channel Based) Sales target for the assigned region / location, by increasing sales from existing customers and by adding new customers. Enhancing Companys market share and reach with key customer segments. 2. Promote the brand BAMEROL by organising meets of Dealers, Distributors, Fleet owners, Mechanics, and by networking with other same & similar users/ influencers, trade partners. Bolster the SBUs Top and Bottom line in a sustainable manner while fur thering the strategic intent of the Retail Sales vertical in the assigned location. 3. Ensure effective planning and implementation of ATL and BTL activities in assigned location, communicate adequately and timely with channel partners about schemes/ incentives and other promotional initiatives. Personally, and proactively handle ATL / BTL initiatives in ones assigned location and ensure minimum grievances of channel partners related to such matters. 4. Drive channel partners teams and marketing associates to create new business opportunities in the assigned territory by effectively causing secondary sales. Plow back ideas and work closely with the marketing team to implement promotional activities. 5. Effectively handle forecasting to ensure effective supply through stock point management. 6. Maintain close relationship with channel partners and ensure effective Debtors management. Lead and support commercial initiatives including negotiation and contract management with assigned channel/ trade partners etc. Ensure that necessary compl iances are maintained for the channel and stock points related to assigned area of operations. 7. Increase the depth and breadth of channel in assigned location by recruiting new distributor/ channel partners  8. Handle related administrative work related to the core deliverables which may include among other things, coordination with production unit, depot stock monitoring, payment collections, customer account reconciliation, statutory forms collection / compliances and fulfilling MIS requirements, reporting on market/competition activities etc. from time to time. The above list is indicative only and not exhaustive COMPENSATION Grade(s)  : E2 Basic Scale (Rs.)  : 50000 - 160000 Initial Basic Pay (Rs.)  : 50000 CTC at the beginning of the scale (Rs / lakhs per annum)  :   16.40  Lakhs per annum CTC shall include Basic Pay, DA, HRA, Medical (for self, spouse and two dependent children), Other Perks & Allowances, Performance Related Pay, encashment of earned leaves, work related benefits and Retiral benefits as applicable in the grade as per rules of the Company. (Post-Retirement Medical Coverage Scheme is applicable to candidates who are 50 years of age or below as on date on which they come on the regular rolls of the Company. However, this condition shall not be applicable in case of candidates who join after resigning from any CPSE, provided the total of past service in the CPSE and future service in the company till the date of normal retirement is 10 years or more). All the benefits will be governed by the policy of the Company in force and as amended from time to time. Candidates employed with Government Departments/ CPSUs / Autonomous Bodies should apply through proper channel, obtaining necessary NOC which is required to be submitted at the time of the interview. In the absence of NOC, no benefit related to continuity of service and/ or Pay Protection shall be admissible to an applicant who is presently serving Government Departments/ CPSUs / Autonomous Bodies. For candidates who do not have NOC issued by Government Departments/ CPSUs / Autonomous Bodies or those from private sector the Basic Salary shall be fixed at  Rs. 50000  per month with a corresponding CTC of  16.40  Lakhs per annum depending on the place of posting.      PLACE OF POSTING The initial place of posting may be in   Lucknow . However, candidates may be placed at any of the locations in India or abroad where the Company or its Joint Ventures has its operations and the decision on the matter shall be made at the time of joining at the sole discretion of the Company depending on the exigencies of work. The Company reserves the right to create a panel through empanelment of candidates if more than one candidate is found suitable and offer employment opportunity to such empaneled candidate(s) in future in similar role at same or different locations. Please read The Other General Conditions before applying for the positions.      HOW TO APPLY   Online submission of application is permitted on the website please register yourself using the link  https://careers.balmerlawrie.com/sap/bc/webdynpro/sap/hrrcf_a_candidate_registration?sap-client=100# till 2359 hours on 05.07.2024.  Detailed advertisement is also available on the above page. Please register yourself using the link :  https://careers.balmerlawrie.com/sap/bc/webdynpro/sap/hrrcf_a_candidate_registration?sap-client=100#   After creation of your profile, please apply against the appropriate job by going into the Employment Opportunities tab.     NOTE : Applications submitted through Balmer Lawrie Career Opportunities link : https://www.balmerlawrie.com/pages/currentopening will only be accepted. Applications sent directly through Naukri Profile / Mail id / or any other means shall be summarily rejected. Applications submitted using the Online format https://www.balmerlawrie.com/pages/currentopening shall only be considered.

column2: About the Role:  Join the team as a Sales Associate in a premium gourmet food retail store where your primary role will be to enhance the customer shopping experience through exceptional service, expert product knowledge, and genuine enthusiasm for gourmet foods. You'll play a key role in driving sales while fostering a culture of customer-centric service and satisfaction. Key Responsibilities: Customer Relationships:  Build and maintain positive relationships with customers, ensuring a high level of satisfaction and loyalty. Product Upselling:  Utilize your knowledge of gourmet products to recommend and upsell, aligning with customer preferences and needs. Customer Engagement:  Actively engage with customers to understand their needs, providing personalized recommendations and demonstrations. Sales and Promotions:  Work collaboratively with the team to meet sales targets and inform customers about new products and ongoing promotions. Store Maintenance:  Keep the sales area clean and organized, ensuring products are attractively displayed and stocked. Transaction Handling:  Process sales transactions accurately and efficiently using the POS system, including handling cash and card payments. Market Awareness:  Stay updated on industry trends, new products, and promotions to effectively communicate to customers. Qualifications: Experience in  Sales , ideally within the  Food, FMCG, or Hospitality industries . Strong background in food-related fields, with a keen interest in gourmet products. Bilingual proficiency in English and Hindi. Proven interpersonal skills with a flair for building rapport and establishing trust. Ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and achieve sales targets. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Willingness to work flexible hours, including evenings, weekends, and holidays. Attributes: A passion for delivering top-tier customer experiences. Effective problem-solving skills with a proactive approach. Capability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic setting. Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities. Why Join Us:  This position offers you the chance to become part of a vibrant team that values professionalism and customer satisfaction. You will have the opportunity to grow professionally in a supportive and dynamic environment, where your efforts make a direct impact on the store's success and customer happiness. Apply Now:  If you are passionate about gourmet foods and love interacting with people, apply today to join our team! Please submit your resume.

column2: We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Retail Sales Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record in the furniture industry, with a focus on retail sales management. As a Retail Sales Manager, you will be responsible for leading our retail sales efforts, driving business growth, managing the sales team, and ensuring exceptional customer experiences.       Key Responsibilities:         Develop and execute effective sales strategies to achieve company sales targets and objectives within the furniture industry.         Lead, motivate, and manage a team of retail sales associates, providing guidance, training, and performance evaluations.         Monitor and analyze sales performance, market trends, and customer preferences to identify opportunities for improvement.         Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, partners, and vendors to enhance business growth and collaboration.         Collaborate with marketing and product teams to provide insights into customer preferences and contribute to product development decisions.         Plan and oversee promotional activities, sales events, and product launches to drive footfall and boost sales.         Ensure that the retail stores appearance is in line with the companys brand image and standards.         Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and issues in a professional and timely manner, striving for customer satisfaction.         Prepare and present regular sales reports, forecasts, and performance metrics to senior management.         Stay updated with industry trends, competitor activities, and market dynamics to adapt strategies accordingly.         Qualifications and Experience:         Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).         4-5 years of proven experience in retail sales management within the furniture industry.         Demonstrated success in achieving and exceeding sales targets and objectives.         Strong understanding of furniture products, market trends, and customer preferences.         Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and drive results.         Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.         Proficiency in using sales management software and tools.         Customer-centric approach with a focus on delivering exceptional customer experiences.         Problem-solving attitude and the ability to make informed decisions under pressure.

column2: Are you a solution provider for the most demanding customers in the industry and looking to join a team that is innovative, collaborative, passionate & loves challenges? Then read on      We are looking for an experienced Sales professional who has the passion to build customer centricity by deeper engagement with industry leading customers      An approachable and inspiring leader with positive attitude and ability to understand customer expectations to find win-win solutions      Partner with Dealerships to deliver a differentiated value proposition for customers        Who are we?        Volvo Construction Equipment is a leading global manufacturer of premium construction equipment and one of the most well-recognized across the industry      With a full product range, manufactured, serviced & supported, we have walked the path of prosperity with our customers and for more than 20 years in India      We are driven by the idea that through talented employees, imagination, hard work and technological innovation, we will lead the way towards developing a world that is cleaner, smarter, and more connected        What we need you to do?          In the Sales Manager function, you will work with dealerships in your designated territory to develop the market, identify segments, collate market intelligence, develop the dealer sales team, and provide inputs and actionable insights to the dealerships      These need to help dealerships provide a superior customer experience, while achieving sales deliverables, price realizationand profitability      You will be based out of Delhi and be responsible for designated dealers in Market Area North        We expect you to:          Drive Retail Sales at the dealerships      Track major projects that would be taken up in future, monitor projects, coordinate with the respective salespeople, to provide solutions to prospective customers      Interact with Dealer Sales managers for sales/service activity      Follow up on deal closing formalities, interface with dealers in the region, visit dealers / customers regularly, interface with sales/logistics, business controllers      Allocate finalized sales targets to dealers, monitor sales performance, provide support to resolve issues, plan and implement activities to not only promote unit sales but also our complete range of solutions like, attachments, RMA, Connectivity Services, EaaS, Productivity Services etc      Define and Coordinate marketing and promotional activities such as customer meets, road shows, Seminars with customer visits to overseas job sites, demo locations & factories, collect market feedback, develop, and implement corrective action plans to enhance image with respect to target audience      Monitor market trends and competitor activity - regional sales volume, upcoming projects etc      and report to Business Head Region for review of company plans to improve sales strategies and achieve targets      Visit customer site, identify areas of concern, Coordinate with Aftermarket and Customer Solution and dealer teams to resolve issues to ensure high degree of customer satisfaction      Monitor participation rate, market share, price realization etc in a defined zone      Accountability:          Unit Sales, Participation Rate and Market Shares.      Planning and forecasting.      Customer Experience      Marketing and promotional campaigns      Projects and Tenders Tracking      Participation related to all segments.      Building capability and competencies at dealerships        Required Competencies        Customer Centricity      Relationship Management      Influencing skills      Collaboration and Networking skills      Negotiation Skills      Assertive Communication Skills      Decision making      The Volvo Group culture is defined by a set of five carefully chosen values- Customer success, Trust, Passion, Change, and Performance.      These values guide our day-to-day behavior and drive our decision-making at all levels of the organization.      They express our shared beliefs across countries and entities to form the basis for a high-performing culture that can help maximize the full potential of the organization.      Our company values help guide us on that journey        We are a company driven by people and together we have a purpose:        To build the world we want to live in.      Not just for our generation but also for the generations to come

column2: A salesperson, often referred to as a sales representative or sales associate, is an individual who is responsible for promoting and selling products or services to customers     Salespeople play a crucial role in driving revenue and building customer relationships for a company     They typically work in retail stores, showrooms, or offices, and may also engage in field sales by visiting clients or prospects       The responsibilities and tasks of a salesperson include:       Customer Interaction: Engaging with customers to understand their needs, preferences, and purchase intent     Salespeople must actively listen, ask questions, and provide relevant information about products or services to assist customers in making informed buying decisions     Product Knowledge: Developing a comprehensive understanding of the products or services offered by the company     Salespeople should be able to effectively communicate the features, benefits, and value proposition of the offerings to potential customers     Sales Presentations and Demonstrations: Conducting product demonstrations or delivering sales presentations to showcase the features and functionality of the products or services     This may involve explaining product specifications, demonstrating how they work, and addressing any concerns or objections raised by customers     Lead Generation and Prospecting: Identifying and pursuing potential customers or leads     Salespeople may use various methods, such as cold calling, networking, referrals, or online lead generation techniques, to find new prospects and expand the customer base     Sales Negotiation and Closing: Negotiating pricing, terms, and conditions with customers to reach mutually beneficial agreements     Salespeople are responsible for closing sales and completing transactions, which may involve handling contracts, processing payments, and arranging for product delivery or service activation     Relationship Building: Developing and maintaining strong relationships with customers to foster loyalty and repeat business     Salespeople often follow up with customers after the sale, address any issues or concerns, and provide ongoing support to build long-term relationships     Sales Target Achievement: Meeting or exceeding sales targets and quotas set by the company     Salespeople are responsible for achieving individual and team sales goals, and they may be required to track their sales activities and report progress to sales managers or supervisors     Market Research and Competitive Analysis: Staying informed about industry trends, customer preferences, and competitive offerings     Salespeople may gather market intelligence, analyze competitor strategies, and provide feedback to the company regarding market trends or customer needs

Candidate must have experience into Flooring / Floor Coating / Industrial Coating   Job Summary:  The Floor Coating Sales Representative will be responsible for driving sales and expanding our market presence within the floor coating industry. This role involves identifying potential clients, establishing and maintaining relationships, providing expert product knowledge, and delivering exceptional customer service to achieve sales targets. Key Responsibilities: Identify and target potential clients in various industries, including commercial, industrial, and residential sectors. Develop and execute effective sales strategies to meet and exceed sales goals. Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and stay informed about industry trends and competitors. Provide technical advice and support to clients, ensuring they select the appropriate products for their needs. Prepare and present detailed proposals and quotations to clients. Negotiate contracts and close sales deals. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships through regular follow-ups and excellent customer service. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional materials and campaigns. Attend trade shows, conferences, and other industry events to network and promote products. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and pipeline updates in the CRM system. Provide feedback to the product development team on customer needs and market trends. Qualifications: Proven experience in sales, preferably within the floor coating or construction industry. Strong knowledge of floor coating products, application techniques, and industry standards. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients. Strong negotiation and closing skills. Self-motivated and results-driven with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficient in using CRM software and other sales tools. Valid driver's license and willingness to travel as required. Interested candidate drop your CV via : Email Id : hrassociate6@bergerindia.com

column2: Overview:  The Store Sales Executive plays a pivotal role in driving sales and ensuring excellent customer service within our retail establishment. They are responsible for engaging with customers, understanding their needs, and guiding them through the purchasing process. This role demands a combination of sales expertise, product knowledge, and interpersonal skills to effectively represent the brand and maximize revenue. Key Responsibilities: Customer Engagement and Sales: Greet customers as they enter the store and provide them with assistance. Actively approach customers to understand their requirements and preferences. Utilize product knowledge to recommend suitable items and upsell where appropriate. Demonstrate enthusiasm and passion for the products to create a positive buying experience. Close sales transactions efficiently and accurately, processing payments and issuing receipts. Meet or exceed sales targets and contribute to overall store profitability. Product Knowledge: Maintain a thorough understanding of the products offered in the store. Stay updated on product features, specifications, and promotions. Provide detailed explanations and demonstrations of product functionality to customers. Address any customer queries or concerns regarding products effectively. Visual Merchandising: Assist in maintaining an appealing and organized store layout. Ensure that products are neatly displayed and adequately stocked. Collaborate with the team to create attractive product displays and window arrangements. Monitor inventory levels and communicate restocking needs to the relevant departments. Customer Service: Foster a welcoming and friendly atmosphere for customers. Listen actively to customer feedback and resolve any issues or complaints professionally. Build strong relationships with customers to encourage repeat business and brand loyalty. Provide after-sales support, including assistance with returns and exchanges. Team Collaboration: Work closely with colleagues to achieve common goals and objectives. Communicate effectively with the sales team and management regarding customer feedback, sales performance, and product availability. Contribute ideas and suggestions for improving sales strategies and customer service initiatives. Qualifications: Proven experience in retail sales or a similar customer-facing role. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong sales acumen with the ability to persuade and negotiate effectively. Enthusiasm for the products being sold and a willingness to learn. Ability to work well in a team environment and collaborate with colleagues. Basic math skills for processing transactions and handling cash. Flexibility to work in shifts, including weekends and holidays, as required. High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or certifications in sales or retail management is a plus. Working Conditions:  The Store Sales Executive primarily works indoors in a retail environment. The role involves standing for extended periods and may require occasional lifting of moderately heavy items. Flexibility in working hours is essential to accommodate peak business times, including evenings, weekends, and holidays. Conclusion:  The Store Sales Executive plays a vital role in driving sales, providing excellent customer service, and enhancing the overall shopping experience for our patrons. This position offers an exciting opportunity for individuals with a passion for sales and a desire to excel in a dynamic retail environment.  If you possess the necessary skills and qualifications, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our continued success.
column11: Communication Skills, Retail Sales, Selling Skills, Convincing Power, Sales Ability, Presentation Skills, Sales Process, Team Skills

column2: Job Description:  Business Development Executive The Business Development Executive will play a crucial role in driving the growth of our brand in the Indian market. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in the luxury furniture or home furnishings industry, with a strong understanding of market dynamics and customer preferences. This role requires a blend of strategic thinking, relationship-building skills, and hands-on sales expertise. Key Responsibilities: Sales & Business Development : Build and maintain strong relationships with architects, interior designers, and high-end residential clients. Develop a robust B2B pipeline of projects from architects and interior designers to ensure the achievement of the monthly sales targets. Identify and engage with potential clients through various channels (networking, referrals, cold calling, etc.). Provide exceptional customer service and support to existing clients. Understand the project timelines from both the architect's and end clients considerations and offer tailored solutions from our product range. Create and present design options to potential clients and provide additional insights to the management team to ensure deal closure. Reporting & Documentation: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and market intelligence. Prepare regular reports on sales performance and market feedback for senior management. Qualifications & Skills: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of experience in business development or sales within the luxury furniture or home furnishings industry. Strong network within the luxury furniture market, including architects, interior designers, and high-net-worth individuals. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Highly proficient with advanced skills in MS Office Suite including PowerPoint and Excel and must have extensive experience with preparing presentations for clients. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. High level of integrity and professional ethics. Location:  Prabhadevi, Mumbai  Reporting Manager:  Senior Business Development Manage

column2: Roles and Responsibilities     The responsibilities and duties section is the most important part of the job description. Here you should outline the functions this position will perform on a regular basis, how the job functions within the organization and the title of the manager the person will report to. Maintain inventory by implementing purchasing plans and staying in contact with the company and the brand. Develop a schedule of holiday activities and promotions throughout the year strategically designed to bring in more revenue Provide training to improve the knowledge base of the staff and utilize cross-training methods to maintain productivity when employees are absent Work with vendors and manufacturers to bring in effective marketing displays for the sales floor and store windows Manage all controllable costs to keep operations profitable   Retail Store Manager qualifications and skills Next, outline the required and preferred skills for your position. This may include education, previous job experience, certifications and technical skills. You may also include soft skills and personality traits that you expect from a successful candidate. While it may be tempting to include a long list of skills and requirements, including too many could dissuade qualified candidates from applying. Keep your list of qualifications concise, but provide enough detail with relevant keywords and terms. Bachelors Degree in Business Administration or related field preferred 5+ years of retail management experience Computer database and productivity software skills required Proven history of successfully training employees in a variety of departments Strong understanding of sales and customer service techniques Demonstrated ability to maintain and work within a budget

column1: Sales Executive - Musical Instruments Retail Shop - Delhi
column2: ROLE PROFILE   To work closely with the host store senior sales, operations and marketing teams to ensure a solid and highly co-operative relationship between the Host and Brand totally aligned with each others goals and expectations. Responsible for achieving monthly sales target and exceeding customer expectations creating customers for life.  To create an exciting and dynamic environment where every customer enjoys the Brand Experience, including the organisation of regular in-store, out-of-store and on-line events. Be a creative resource to the Web/Marketing/Social Media teams, identifying opportunities for new and engaging content that is On Brand with both Dealer and Brand. Develop the host dealers Brands marketing activity to drive awareness and sales, via store, online and external events in the form of campaigns and promotions. To be pro-active in terms of social media, promoting all activities happening in connection with the Brand Store. Develop and manage a database of existing, new customers, and potential customers recognising the critical importance of maintaining regular contact with existing customers to provide post sales service such as how they are getting on with recent purchases via C.R.M. and Backstage. Responsible for coaching and mentoring dealer frontline staff to become competent and confident in recommending Brand, BOSS and V-MODA products over the competition. To adopt proven space management and merchandising techniques driving all sales and marketing activities within the Brand Store and the local business community in line with instructions from the Retail Area Manager and the Host dealers Store Manager. Responsible for ensuring that all Brand Store floor stock is displayed, clean, priced, secure and demo??ready. Develop dealer host website and social media platforms, where appropriate. Self-motivated to personally advance product knowledge, sales skills and demonstration expertise across all Brand and Boss product categories to build Brand and Boss brand awareness in line with market trends. Fully integrated within the culture of the host, passionate about the overall Brand, Boss and V-Moda sales across the business, constantly thinking of new ways to innovate and drive traffic to all sales outlets. Role Accountabilities:   Brand Store   Annual/Quarterly Plan   Allocates time for planning, improving general organisation, reviewing sales performance and proactive sales and marketing activities. Together with the Retail Area Manager helps to develop, agrees, implements and measures the success of the Quarterly Plan. Presents the agreed quarterly plan to the host store manager and presents an update of progress v objectives at 121 meetings. Achieve a monthly Sales Out target, but also be aware of the quarterly Sales In targets, and where appropriate, use this to form daily/weekly/monthly focus plans.  Review performance vs plan with Area Manager during store visit or 121 meetings. React immediately to outcomes and actions from the Retail Area Manager following receipt of Host Dealer and Brand Store visit emails. Strive to play a key part of the host dealer retail front line team through promoting and developing the Brand Store concept and leading by example. Active with all areas of host business by developing relationships locally and externally ensuring Brand, Boss and V-Moda products get maximum exposure both online and offline.  Is a support for all areas of the host business, sees this as a way of developing within the host and developing the Brand Store role. Looks for ways to innovate and for both parties to grow significantly each year.  Plans/implement a programme of short but effective training/coaching sessions for frontline dealer retail staff recording outcomes/observations on the quarterly plan. In Store Experience & Retail-Readiness   Ensures that agreed stocking profile (on display and back up) is maintained at all times, with any shortfalls and over-stocks being discussed with Retail Area Manager and Host store manager/purchaser. Is actively involved in weekly replenishment orders. Merchandise products in their product categories, wherever necessary showing the range of the product by price point to assist with upselling. Ensures that the space is managed effectively, with enough space around products and key/new products in prominent positions. Ensure that all products are connected to power, turned on and available for demonstration through an audio source, preferably in stereo. Check that POS and promotional items are displayed in the correct position in time for the opening day of the promotion and removed at the close of the promotion. Ensures all media screens are turned on and running the appropriate presentation. Ensure price tickets are accurate and visible to encourage customer engagement. Secure regular displays in the host dealer window or other promotional spots. Maintains a high-quality Brand Store sales and service area at all times by replacing light bulbs immediately where possible and also identifies any failures that cannot be fixed in store straight away. Keeps the sales and service area clean at all times. Adhere to the Dealer host expectations regarding punctuality. Conform to the minimum requirement regarding personal appearance & hygiene. Sales and Service   Monthly sales target is the minimum acceptable. Plans to exceed target. Uses the appropriate resources report sales performance v target & update daily. Discovers the customers??true creative goals and then applies the six steps of retail selling whilst demonstrating appropriate products; Qualify customer, identify customer needs and sell features and benefits. Anticipates objections and look to positively close the sale. Use rehearsed product demonstrations, be aware of customer reactions at all times of the sales process, reacts positively and ensures the customer is ??ands on??with product where possible. Maintains control and aims to close each sale. Regularly delivers demonstrations and holds customer sales conversations via video conferencing platforms, such as Teams or Zoom. Seek authorisation by store management for competitive product pricing. Look to increase sales revenue through an added accessories sale/s. Understand the importance of creating an environment where customer complaints are seen both as constructive feedback and an opportunity to improve customer service. Deals with complaints effectively and inform store and line manager of outcome and actions. Telesales and CRM Database Management   Endeavour to take customer names and email details from telephone, email and product enquiries via Backstage and CRM. Provides a response within 24 working hours. Always looks for opportunities to gather data to improve the customer database and customer experience. Generates a constant pipeline of pre-sales enquiries and appointments to drive sales managed within C.R.M (usually 30-40 new customers per month), on the occasions the customer doesn?? purchase at the initial interaction. Handle pre-sales enquiries and post sales product support enquiries relating to the Brand Store including technical queries, returns & repairs where necessary via Backstage and CRM. Responds to such enquiries within 24 working hours. Understands how to research solutions independently and work with Product Specialists and Brand tech support to find solutions. Always promote extended warranty and register product on the customer?? behalf via Backstage (at least 30-40 registrations per month) All sales to be followed up within one month by a post-sale call or email (excluding accessories unless appropriate). Database entry to be updated accordingly, i.e. new follow-up date entered for six-month one-to-one training session. All sales to be followed up at six months (excluding accessories unless appropriate) with invitation to one to one training session by appointment. Establish customer's new needs and prepare suitable solutions. Identify additional sales opportunities and prepare presentation within training session. Set new follow-up date and update database accordingly. Puts time aside each day to contact customers via telephone, email or video conferencing for pre-sale and post-sale customer calls. Marketing   Submit a regular Social Media posts (daily/weekly to be agreed) via Host Dealers social media channels and record the activity, date, social media platform used and engagement results. Presents regular weekly ??ive Streams??via the Host?? Facebook channel, planning events at least 1 month in advance and adhering to deadlines and standards, with the Brand and Host store marketing team. Organises at least one in-store or out-of-store event each month and plans ahead working closely with Brand and Host Store marketing team. Use position within the business to identify customer pain points, and gain support from relevant stakeholders to create new content (Blog/Video). Regularly review host dealer?? website, noting and informing marketing dept of issues relating to: Product images, quantity and brand standard Information being up-to-date and relevant Key product pages have a Brand branded video, or unique Dealer branded video.  Our products should be listed as ??uggested Products??on relevant high traffic product pages (our brand and others), subject to dealer approval Influencing average transaction value by adding all relevant accessories to ??uggested Products??section, the next up-sell product in range, the bundle alternative listing, subject to dealer management approval Bundle offerings Department Management and Administration   Find time to plan ahead using Outlook, always aware of priorities, and constantly measuring performance against the Quarterly Plan.  Plan and implement a programme of short sales training and product demonstration sessions for dealer front line staff as a means of growing revenue and to motivate staff to recommend and sell Brand products before competitor brands. Train agreed staff members to make the Brand Store area retail ready in their absence and to provide sales reports to Brand Head Office. Maintain a clean, demo ready store as highlighted in Store Walk checklist. Complete actions required from Store Walk checklist promptly. Review stock profile monthly. Eliminate out of stock items quickly by working with Store Manager and the dealers Area Manager to replenish stock quickly and accurately. Maintain control of all stock and process flagship sales immediately and accurately. Ensure hot product is always in stock or has enough backorders. Responsible for making Brand accounts department, dealer Area Manager and Retail Area Manager aware when loan stock has been sold within three working days. Before closing time each Saturday email weekly report to European Retail Manager, Retail Area Manager, Sales Managers, Area Manager and Managing Director.  Regularly feedback ideas and general observations to Retail Area Manager. Submit monthly commission report to accounts by 2nd working day of following month. Communication   Always takes an active part in or organises weekly host store meetings and store activities. Sees them as a means of getting staff focussed on Brand, BOSS, V-MODA and raises the profile of the Brand Store. Plans to contribute at monthly Brand Store Sales meetings. Communicate information and opportunities to the host Store Manager. Takes every opportunity to keep the Store Manager involved. Maintain a high level of communication with the Retail Area Manager. Communicate news, updates of sales v target, future sales and business development activity planned. Regularly feedback new and innovative ideas to the Retail Area Manager, Sales Manager, Marketing and Product Managers.  Take part in regular 1-2-1 meetings (usually monthly) with Retail Area Manager, to agree personal goals, update progress and discuss any other issues relating to your job role and personal requirements, issues and well-being. Summary of Key Skills   Six Steps of Retail Essential Selling Skills  Uses open, probing and high gain questioning skills to identify customer aspirations, identifies features, and sells product benefits, overcomes objections and persuasively sells and influences each customer to purchase Brand, BOSS & V-MODA product.  Product Demonstration & Customer Experience  Extensive product knowledge and demonstration capability. The ability to deliver a fantastic customer-focused experience in a busy environment, whether online or offline, resulting in sales growth  Video Presentation  Uses clear language and communication as well as a planned demonstration to present products, suggestions and ideas via live-streams and video conferencing tools.  Event Management  Experience in planning, organising and implementing events??nline or offline??sing the usual social media channels  Relationship Management  The communication skills to converse, build positive relationships and interact appropriately with individuals, customers, and the host store team??t all levels  Department Management  Effectively manages all aspects of the Brand Store including but not exclusively, the layout of the area, displays, latest POS, up to date video content. Also ensures the department has cover during absences from work.  Organisation  The confidence and organisational skills to manage all aspects of a busy retail environment, being the sole Brand link between the host store and Brand HQ  Quarterly Plan  Constructs quarterly plans that maximises footfall, web traffic and sustains sales growth.  Availability & Visibility  Maintains 100% stock availability, product visibility and display space.  Training the Trainer  Fully competent in designing and delivering 1:1 sales or product training or group training sessions for Dealer front line sales staff and RUK Product Specialists during induction training or at team meetings.  Proactive Telemarketing  Proactively makes effective telemarketing calls to follow up enquiries, brochure requests and secures appointments at special events.  Managing Databases  Gathers and accurately inputs data when monitoring promotional sell through, special events, new product launch?? and social media activities.  Global Organisational Objectives   Become the World?? Best Digital Musical Instrument Company  Create more Brand fans through unique and innovative product design Lead globally with consistent profitability and strong growth Become a company represented by pride, motivation, a sense of urgency and the spirit to overcome challenges

column2: Job Description:  We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented GT and MT Sales Officer to join our team in the FMCG sector. The successful candidate will be responsible for driving sales in both traditional (GT) and modern (MT) retail channels, achieving revenue targets, and building strong relationships with customers and distributors.  Key Responsibilities:   Develop and implement effective sales strategies to meet or exceed assigned GT and MT sales targets.  Identify and pursue new sales opportunities in the assigned territory. Meet or exceed monthly and annual sales targets  Build and maintain strong relationships with key customers, distributors, and retailers in both GT and MT segments.   Identify and explore new business opportunities to expand the company's presence in traditional and modern retail outlets.   Efficiently manage product distribution across assigned territories, ensuring optimal stock levels and availability.   Plan and execute promotional activities to boost sales, including coordinating in-store promotions and displays.   Prepare regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and competitor activities. Qualifications and Skills:   A bachelor's degree in business administration MBA  1-3 years of experience in FMCG sales, with a focus on both GT and MT channels.  Strong negotiation and communication skills.   Familiarity with distribution networks and supply chain management.  Key skills :  Distribution Management, Market Expansion, Sales Strategy
column11: FMCG Sales, Modern Trade, Channel Distribution, General Trade, Distributor Handling

column1: Urgent Hiring Sales Executive/ Sr. Sales Executive ( Only Male )
column2: Position Overview:  As a Real Estate Consultant Sales Executive, you will play a crucial role in driving sales and  providing expert advice to clients in the real estate industry. You will be responsible for  generating leads, building client relationships, and closing deals. Your expertise in real estate  market trends, property valuation, and investment opportunities will help clients make informed  decisions  Role & responsibilities    ??Lead Generation: Proactively identify potential clients through various channels such as  referrals, networking events, online platforms, and marketing campaigns.   Client Consultation: Understand clients' needs and preferences by conducting thorough  consultations and analysing their requirements. Provide professional guidance on  property selection, investment opportunities, financing options, and market trends.   Property Presentations: Prepare and deliver compelling property presentations to  clients, showcasing the features, benefits, and value proposition of available properties.  Address any concerns or queries raised by clients.   Negotiation and Deal Closure: Engage in negotiations with clients, property owners, and  other relevant parties to secure favourable terms and conditions for both buyers and  sellers. Follow through on the transaction process, ensuring all legal and financial  requirements are met for a successful deal closure.   Market Research: Continuously stay updated on local and regional real estate market  trends, property values, and investment opportunities. Analyse market data and provide  insights to clients to assist them in making informed decisions.   Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, real  estate developers, property owners, and other industry professionals. Nurture long-term  connections to generate repeat business and referrals.   Documentation and Compliance: Ensure accurate and timely preparation of all  necessary documentation, contracts, agreements, and compliance requirements related to  real estate transactions. Adhere to legal and ethical standards throughout the process.   Sales Performance Tracking: Maintain detailed records of sales activities, client  interactions, and deal progress. Track key performance indicators (KPIs) such as sales  targets, conversion rates, and revenue generation to assess personal and team  performance.   Industry Knowledge Sharing: Stay abreast of industry developments, market trends,  and regulatory changes in the real estate sector. Share knowledge and expertise with  colleagues and contribute to the overall growth and success of the organization.  Preferred candidate profile    ??Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Real Estate, or a related field (preferred).  ??Proven track record in real estate sales or a similar role, with a strong understanding of  sales techniques and customer relationship management.  ??In-depth knowledge of the local real estate market, including property types, pricing,  investment opportunities, and legal regulations.  ??Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build rapport with clients and  negotiate effectively.  ??Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to assess client needs, evaluate property  values, and identify investment prospects.  ??Proficiency in using CRM software, online property databases, and other real estate tools.  ??Ability to work independently and as part of a team, while managing multiple priorities  and meeting deadlines
column11: Sales, Real Estate Sales, Sales Executive Activities, Broker, Direct Sales, Property, Residential Sales
